issues.description: Long timestamp causes potential horizontal overflow and poor readability
issues.recommendation: Shorten timestamp or wrap text to fit within button width

issues.description: Inconsistent text length compared to other buttons disrupts visual rhythm
issues.recommendation: Standardize text length or use ellipsis for truncated text

issues.description: Non-essential timestamp distracts from primary actions (NEW TOURNAMENT)
issues.recommendation: Prioritize primary actions and hide secondary details like timestamps

issues.description: Long text causes uneven vertical spacing between buttons
issues.recommendation: Adjust button width or text length to maintain consistent spacing

issues.description: Numeric counts (0) instead of descriptive text reduce clarity
issues.recommendation: Replace (0) with 'No games' or similar descriptive text

Home::desktop.summary: The 'RESUME TOURNAMENT' button's long timestamp causes layout/typography issues, while numeric counts in 'MANAGE GAMES'/'MANAGE TEAMS' reduce clarity. Visual hierarchy is weakened by non-essential details.
